definition: paragraph/section/segment/stage (of a process)/classifier for stories, periods of time, lengths of thread etc

sentences.english: Signals in the spectrum can penetrate walls, making it ideal for wireless broadband.
sentences.chinese: 該頻段的信號可以穿透牆壁，從而非常適合無線寬帶。

sentences.english: They have more bottom end, a warmer, mellower mid and upper mid-range, and often more top octave.
sentences.chinese: 低端豐滿，中頻又溫又純，更經常在極高頻段更出彩。

sentences.english: It is a bit like radiowaves coding different radio stations at different frequency bands.
sentences.chinese: 這有點像無線電波在不同的頻段接收不同的廣播電臺。

sentences.english: Each module with antenna can be used as a single jammer.
sentences.chinese: 每一個帶天線的模塊可單獨作爲某頻段的屏蔽器使用。

sentences.english: Proprietary Equalizer for editing audio using specific frequency bands.
sentences.chinese: 採用特定頻段編輯音頻的專用均衡器。

sentences.english: This theory can be used to develop a microwave phase conjugator.
sentences.chinese: 這一理論可用於微波頻段相位共軛器的研製。

sentences.english: Everyone doesn't see the color frequency in exactly the same way.
sentences.chinese: 其實，我們每個人能看到的色彩頻段都不完全相同。

sentences.english: Classic Fm is my favorite, please tune it in.
sentences.chinese: 古典調頻電臺是我的最愛，請調到那個頻段。

sentences.english: A station may only be worked once per band.
sentences.chinese: 在不同頻段一個電臺只能通聯一次。

sentences.english: An S-band broadband low noise amplifier(LNA) design is introduced.
sentences.chinese: 設計了一個S頻段寬帶低噪聲放大器。

sentences.english: The extra wide wear band is located at the furthest point from the rod bushing to support maximum loading.
sentences.chinese: 穿的超寬頻段位於從套管支持最大負荷杆最遠點。

sentences.english: The MMT also has minimal power requirements.
sentences.chinese: 該多頻段微型收發器也有最低的功率要求。

sentences.english: The paper also suggests that reverse C-band could be used in developing HAPS's Chinese version.
sentences.chinese: 建議利用反向C頻段開發我國的平流層通信系統。

sentences.english: For example, peaks in the measured receive signal correspond to frequencies that create standing waves.
sentences.chinese: 例如，接收信號的最高峯對應的是產生駐波的頻段。

sentences.english: At last, the proposed antenna satisfies the working requirement of wireless communication system.
sentences.chinese: 最終得到一款滿足無線通信中應用需求的雙頻段天線。

sentences.english: This dissertation gives a detail study on the design technique and theory of dual-band filters for wireless communication systems.
sentences.chinese: 雙頻段濾波器也成爲這些通信系統前端的重要器件。

pinyin: zi4 ran2 yu3 yan2 chu3 li3

definition: network router/gateway (to Internet or between networks)
